text: Letters to the President is the first album by pop punk band Hawk Nelson. It was released on October 4, 2005. ==Track listing== #"California" – 2:52 #"Things We Go Through" – 2:31 #"Every Little Thing" – 3:07 #"From Underneath" – 2:45 #"Letters To The President" – 3:13 #"Right Here" – 3:11 #"Recess" – 0:50 #"Take Me" – 3:30 #"Someone Else Before" – 3:17 #"First Time" – 2:37 #"Like A Racecar" – 2:48 #"The Show" – 1:53 #"36 Days" – 3:42 #"Long And Lonely Road" – 3:10 Category:2004 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Pop punk albums Category:Hawk Nelson albums
title: Letters to the President
